channel.title: The Gauntlet Process for Podcast Production
channel.description:
On the new Gauntlet Podcast, we talk with @RichRogers about podcast editing: what you need to do, how to approach audio, and a host of tips & advice. Rich edits all our Gauntlet Network podcasts; if you're interested in podcasting, let his experience help. Seriously-- he's done tons of work across multiple networks.
www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-gauntlet-podcast/podcast-production-the-gauntlet-process

item.title: The Gauntlet Process for Podcast Production

@edige23 wrote:

On the new Gauntlet Podcast, we talk with @RichRogers about podcast editing: what you need to do, how to approach audio, and a host of tips & advice.
